_data.title: Add Account

children.value:
This webhook is used to verify the user's identity by checking the mobile number and date of birth shared by the user.
Once the verification is successful, the response should include details of the accounts held by the user in the entity. The same webhook is also used to get the latest status of user accounts.
to our platform to receive requests from us.
The response should be in a
and include all the accounts of the user in the entity.
Each parameter will be validated as indicated.
Name of the account holder registered with the entity.
Branch code where the account is maintained.
Date of opening the account from the branch. (YYYY-MM-DD).
Maximum amount that can be transferred through NEFT / UPI.
If debit transactions are not allowed for the account, keep it

_data.text:
This webhook is used to verify the user's identity by checking the mobile number and date of birth shared by the user. Once the verification is successful, the response should include details of the accounts held by the user in the entity. The same webhook is also used to get the latest status of user accounts. ## Request You need to add a `Webhook URI` to our platform to receive requests from us. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | Description | | ---------- | --- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | Mobile number of user.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 919876543210 | | **dob** | | `String` | Date of birth of user. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-20 | ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "addAccount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606382250" }, "content": "ad4bc19805131070e1f449fd9052ea1d46d930f02e63691da25cde5bcce8fb7ba3443f401de910783e34c32e0e9c1c40.80b5ec555df9175c" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "addAccount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606382250" }, "content": { "data": { "mobile": "911313131313", "dob": "2020-11-20" } } } ``` ## Response All data in the response `content` is required to proceed. The response should be in a `array` and include all the accounts of the user in the entity. ### Parameters Each parameter will be validated as indicated. | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------------ | --- | --------- | --- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **account_name** | | `String` | | Name of the account holder registered with the entity.
Character length : **30 (Max)**
Only **UPPERCASE** letters are allowed.
_Eg:_ RAJESH KJ | | **account_number** | | `String` | | User account number.
Character length : **04 (Min), 20 (Max)**
_Eg:_ 123456789 | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code where the account is maintained.
Character length : **10 (Max)**
_Eg:_ BR001 | | **account_type** | | `String` | | Possible values
  • `SAVING_ACCOUNT`
  • `CURRENT_ACCOUNT`
  • `GENERAL_LOAN`
  • `GOLD_LOAN`
  • `CASH_CREDIT`
  • `DEPOSIT_LOAN`
_Eg:_ `SAVING_ACCOUNT` | | **account_class** | | `String` | | Classification of account under **account_type**.
Character length : **20 (Max)**
_Eg:_ AGRICULTURAL LOAN | | **account_status** | | `String` | | Current status of account.
Possible values
  • `ACTIVE`
  • `INACTIVE`
  • `BLOCKED`
  • `CLOSED`
_Eg:_ `ACTIVE` | | **account_opening_date** | | `String` | | Date of opening the account from the branch. (YYYY-MM-DD).
_Eg:_ 2020-11-20 | | **txn_amount_limit** | | `String` | | Maximum amount that can be transferred through NEFT / UPI.
Character length : **6 (Max)**
_Eg:_ 44999 | | **is_debit_allowed** | | `Boolean` | | If debit transactions are not allowed for the account, keep it `false`.
Default value is true.
Possible values
  • `true`
  • `false`
_Eg:_ true | ### Response Code #### Success Response - `1001` - SUCCESS #### Failed Response - `2011` - No active account found - `2012` - Account not found for user. - `2013` - DOB mismatch - `2014` - Mobile number not found ### Response format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "addAccount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606386808" }, "content": "1fbabd370e2e792086c51db47d306fbe5a53479f4f3285605f32d26cd85afe3402596eb8363764ed1d6570282cb22bef830f12d88446975f45a7eaee1207e0d71ffcc9cd19b7cb499cfe286f52633be4ecc5523020b2f3c0d1ea3cc0b379d132bb0cf992398d59e5dee732e3bda14ce835021a67af140b79b4de743149dfb53fcc25986a69.0b1aab597fb7d3c2" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "addAccount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606386808" }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "accounts": [ { "account_name": "RAJESH", "account_number": "3988762547326", "branch_code": "BR001", "account_type": "SAVING_ACCOUNT", "account_class": "", "account_status": "ACTIVE", "account_opening_date": "2020-01-26", "txn_amount_limit": "50000", "is_debit_allowed": false }, { "account_name": "RAJ", "account_number": "3988762547312", "branch_code": "BR002", "account_type": "GOLD_LOAN", "account_class": "AGRICULTURAL LOAN", "account_status": "INACTIVE", "account_opening_date": "2019-04-13", "txn_amount_limit": "40000", "is_debit_allowed": true } ] } } } ```

_data.title: Check Balance

children.value: This Webhook is used to retrieve the latest balance in the account held by the user.
to our platform to receive requests from us.
The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
The account number of the requesting user.
Branch code holding account number in the entity.
The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
The account number of the requesting user.
Branch code holding account number in the entity.
The latest balance amount in the respective account number.
- Account number and mobile number do not match

_data.text:
This Webhook is used to retrieve the latest balance in the account held by the user. ## Request You need to add a `Webhook URI` to our platform to receive requests from us. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | --------- | --- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | | The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 919876543210 | | **account_number** | | `String` | | The account number of the requesting user.
_Eg:_ 3988762547321 | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code holding account number in the entity.
_Eg:_ BR001 | ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "balanceCheck", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": "98dec42cdff07e315337995b5c41ee64ca0e8b22f12d2646116752930b3205eb0b66441aae2efcf2293db309e7a0f8b2cd00a64b4a0704aa540c9860ebbf5a5ac05ecad4d8e2ebc62695e919c0ecec92ceefaac351a52952264eb89e48db8537.c38a6bcdf9cb713d" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "balanceCheck", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": { "data": { "mobile": "919876543210", "account_number": "12345678", "branch_code": "BR001" } } } ``` ## Response All data in the response `content` is required to proceed. If **no transaction found**, the `balance_amount` in the response should be **0** (zero). ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | --------- | --- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | | The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 919876543210 | | **account_number** | | `String` | | The account number of the requesting user.
_Eg:_ 3988762547321 | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code holding account number in the entity.
_Eg:_ BR001 | | **balance_amount** | | `String` | | The latest balance amount in the respective account number.
_Eg:_ 123456.00 | ### Response Code #### Success Response - `1001` - SUCCESS #### Failed Response - `2031` - Invalid account - `2032` - Account number and mobile number do not match ### Response format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "balanceCheck", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": "76fb033da33cc60c1c32e991cd2587c177d9fff96dc1b0ec1fffc877eaa132c39db05e8a46aa7569a1e729a5cbf74620f3bc514847393744f28c60d26511b270e24b614e3d416eff18bdb759a1cd3ab1e96c8092b1476150117928503036874458a6e86b7b4f0ea1bd31bc8a42710459.e2412b23a26016bc" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "balanceCheck", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "mobile": "919876543210", "account_number": "12345678", "branch_code": "BR001", "balance_amount": "2000" } } } ```

_data.title: Account Statement

children.value: This Webhook is used to retrieve the account statement of the account held by the user.
to our platform to receive requests from us.
The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
The account number of the requesting user.
Branch code holding account number in the entity.
Start date of account statement details. (YYYY-MM-DD)
End date of account statement details. (YYYY-MM-DD)
The response should be in an
and include all transactions between the shared
The same account number shared to receive the statement.
The same branch code shared to receive the statement.
The same start date shared to receive the statement. (YYYY-MM-DD)
The same end date shared to receive the statement. (YYYY-MM-DD)
Unique ID saved for the transaction.
In case of a withdrawal, the withdrawal amount for the transaction ID.
In case of a deposit, the deposit amount for the transaction ID.
The balance amount after the deposit or withdrawal to the transaction ID.
Note or description of each transaction
- Account number and mobile number do not match

_data.text:
This Webhook is used to retrieve the account statement of the account held by the user. ## Request You need to add a `Webhook URI` to our platform to receive requests from us. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | --------- | --- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | | The mobile number of the user who holds the account in the entity.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 919876543210 | | **account_number** | | `String` | | The account number of the requesting user.
_Eg:_ 3988762547321 | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code holding account number in the entity.
_Eg:_ BR001 | | **start_date** | | `String` | | Start date of account statement details. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-01 | | **end_date** | | `String` | | End date of account statement details. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-31 | The maximum difference between the `start_date` and the `end_date` is **180 days**. ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "accountStatement", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": "98dec42cdff07e315337995b5c41ee64ca0e8b22f12d2646116752930b3205eb0b66441aae2efcf2293db309e7a0f8b2cd00a64b4a0704aa540c9860ebbf5a5ac05ecad4d8e2ebc62695e919c0ecec92ceefaac351a52952264eb89e48db8537.c38a6bcdf9cb713d" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "accountStatement", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": { "data": { "mobile": "911313131313", "account_number": "3988762547322", "branch_code": "BR001", "start_date": "2020-11-01", "end_date": "2020-11-31" } } } ``` ## Response All data in the response `content` is required to proceed. The response should be in an `array` and include all transactions between the shared **dates** of the account. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | -------- | --- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **account_number** | | `String` | | The same account number shared to receive the statement.
_Eg:_ 3988762547322 | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | The same branch code shared to receive the statement.
_Eg:_ BR001 | | **start_date** | | `String` | | The same start date shared to receive the statement. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-01 | | **end_date** | | `String` | | The same end date shared to receive the statement. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-31 | | **txn_id** | | `String` | | Unique ID saved for the transaction.
_Eg:_ 1a21s5s65f32s13d54as | | **date** | | `String` | | The transaction date. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-31 | | **debit_amount** | | `String` | | In case of a withdrawal, the withdrawal amount for the transaction ID.
_Eg:_ 1200.00 | | **credit_amount** | | `String` | | In case of a deposit, the deposit amount for the transaction ID.
_Eg:_ 600.50 | | **balance** | | `String` | | The balance amount after the deposit or withdrawal to the transaction ID.
_Eg:_ 1800.50 | | **description** | | `String` | | Note or description of each transaction
_Eg:_ Cash Self Deposit | ### Response Code #### Success Response - `1001` - SUCCESS #### Failed Response - `2031` - Invalid account - `2032` - Account number and mobile number do not match ### Response format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "accountStatement", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": "76fb033da33cc60c1c32e991cd2587c177d9fff96dc1b0ec1fffc877eaa132c39db05e8a46aa7569a1e729a5cbf74620f3bc514847393744f28c60d26511b270e24b614e3d416eff18bdb759a1cd3ab1e96c8092b1476150117928503036874458a6e86b7b4f0ea1bd31bc8a42710459.e2412b23a26016bc" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "accountStatement", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "account": { "account_number": "3988762547322", "branch_code": "BR001", "start_date": "2020-11-01", "end_date": "2020-11-31" }, "transactions": [ { "txn_id": "1245236ss45s4ad", "date": "2020-11-04", "debit_amount": "8,058.50", "credit_amount": "", "balance": "2640.50", "description": "Cheque Number - 005652" }, { "txn_id": "ht445236546h45fedd", "date": "2020-11-21", "debit_amount": "", "credit_amount": "10499.00", "balance": "10699.00", "description": "Cash Self Deposit" } ] } } } ```

_data.title: Confirm Debit

children.value: This API is used to confirm the transaction by debiting the amount from the remitter user account.
This API can only be used by the
When the user receives money from the
Status code for the transaction request.
Unique Transaction ID received in the Debit Amount Webhook.
Transaction amount debited from the remitter account.
A unique transaction reference id created by the remitter entity.
The latest balance after debiting the
if the remitter user's account has sufficient balance. Else
- Account number and mobile number do not match
The status of the API request.
User's mobile number. The beneficiary number will be masked.
User's account number. The beneficiary account number will be masked.
Unique transaction ID for each transaction.
The amount charged by the bank for the transaction.
Timestamp of the Debit Amount Webhook.
The unique transaction reference id created by the remitter entity.

_data.text:
#### API: `/debit` # This API is used to confirm the transaction by debiting the amount from the remitter user account. This API can only be used by the **remitter entity** of the respective transaction. - If the `txn_type` in the Debit Amount Webhook is **PAYMENT** / **EX_PAYMENT** call the Confirm Debit API with the **status** `SUCCESS` / `FAILED` in **realtime**. - If the `txn_type` in the Debit Amount Webhook is **WITHDRAWAL** call the Confirm Debit API with the **status** `HOLD` in **realtime**. - When the user receives money from the **entity's** cash counter, call the Confirm Debit API in **realtime** and confirm with the **status** `SUCCESS`. - If the user **fails** to collect money from the **entity's** cash counter, a request to Confirm Debit API should be sent with the **status** `FAILED` after closing the daybook. ## Request ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ----------------- | --- | --------- | --- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **API_ID** | | `String` | | Unique ID generated from the **dashboard**.
_Eg:_ 1a21as51a351f1155f | | **API_KEY** | | `String` | | Unique KEY generated from the **dashboard**.
_Eg:_ AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S | | **code** | | `String` | | Status code for the transaction request. [Find result codes](#result-codes) | | **status** | | `String` | | The status against transaction created.
Allowed values
  • `SUCCESS`
  • `FAILED`
  • `HOLD`
| | **txn_id** | | `String` | | Unique Transaction ID received in the Debit Amount Webhook.
_Eg:_ 1606481855474083 | | **txn_type** | | `String` | | Allowed values
  • `PAYMENT`
  • `REFUND`
  • `WITHDRAWAL`
  • `EX_PAYMENT`
| | **txn_amount** | | `String` | | Transaction amount debited from the remitter account.
_Eg:_ 1200.99 | | **txn_reference** | | `String` | | A unique transaction reference id created by the remitter entity.
_Eg:_ 123456789ghhg08nxv | |**account_balance**| | `String` | | The latest balance after debiting the **txn_amount**. | - Send request as `SUCCESS` / `HOLD` if the remitter user's account has sufficient balance. Else **status** must be`FAILED`. - Use `HOLD` only if the `txn_type` in the Debit Amount Webhook is **WITHDRAWAL**. ### Result Code #### Success Result - `1001` - SUCCESS / HOLD #### Failed Result - `9999` - Insufficient balance - `9998` - Account not found - `9997` - Account is inactive / blocked / closed - `9996` - Debit is not allowed - `9994` - Account number and mobile number do not match - `9993` - User declined - `9992` - Time expired ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmDebit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955", "auth": { "API_ID": "1a21as51a351f1155f", "API_KEY": "AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S" } }, "content": "40b7d3a400fef86b07c94cfab9fbd0d13e3ec1bd0a89f9c4ac710b29f980f727d2d33f5359799fc621a60b2c31ea9f6c7e99f51a13ddcebee950001b711cef55733092dfb8f451024ca59aeb3db35f4327d2.24e3f5bb2f7a0e2a" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmDebit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955", "auth": { "API_ID": "1a21as51a351f1155f", "API_KEY": "AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S" } }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "txn_id": "1606481855474083", "txn_type": "PAYMENT", "txn_amount": "1200", "txn_reference": "123456789ghhg08nxv", "account_balance":"45200.30" } } } ``` ## Response ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------- | --- | --------- | --- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **code** | | `String` | | Status code for API request. | | **status** | | `String` | | The status of the API request. | | **mobile** | | `String` | | User's mobile number. The beneficiary number will be masked. | | **name** | | `String` | | Name of the user. | | **account_number** | | `String` | | User's account number. The beneficiary account number will be masked. | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code of the entity. | | **entity_name** | | `String` | | Name of entity. | | **entity_code** | | `String` | | Unique code for the entity. | | **txn_id** | | `String` | | Unique transaction ID for each transaction. | | **txn_type** | | `String` | | The type of transaction. | | **txn_bank_charge** | | `String` | | The amount charged by the bank for the transaction. | | **txn_amount** | | `String` | | The transaction amount. | | **txn_total_amount**| | `String` | | Total transaction amount including **txn_bank_charge**. | | **txn_date** | | `String` | | Date of transaction. Format (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-03 | | **txn_note** | | `String` | | User-added note for reference. | | **txn_debit_ts** | | `String` | | Timestamp of the Debit Amount Webhook. | | **txn_reference** | | `String` | | The unique transaction reference id created by the remitter entity. | ### Response Code #### Success Response - `1001` - SUCCESS #### Failed Response - `9989` - **txn_reference** is not unique - `9988` - Transaction details do not match - `9987` - Insufficient wallet balance ### Response format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmDebit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955" }, "content": ".2a79cf12b7b90fdd" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmDebit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955" }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "remitter": { "mobile": "911313131313", "name": "BINU", "account_number": "3988762547322", "branch_code": "BR001", "entity_name": "ICICI", "entity_code": "in.icici" }, "beneficiary": { "mobile": "91******1111", "name": "RAJESH", "account_number": "********321", "branch_code": "BR001", "entity_name": "ICICI", "entity_code": "in.icici" }, "transaction": { "txn_id": "1606481855474083", "txn_type": "WITHDRAWAL", "txn_amount": "100", "txn_bank_charge": "3", "txn_total_amount": "103", "txn_date": "2020-11-27", "txn_note": "the txn_type of transaction is cash", "txn_debit_ts": "1606481879", "txn_reference": "123456789ghhg08nxv" } } } } ```

_data.title: Confirm Credit

children.value: This API is used to complete the transaction by crediting the amount to the beneficiary's account.
This API can only be used by the
When the user handover money to the
Status code for the transaction request.
Unique Transaction ID received in the Credit Amount Webhook.
Transaction amount creditted to the beneficiary account.
A unique transaction reference id created by the beneficiary entity.
The latest balance after crediting the
is credited to the beneficiary's account. Else
- Account number and mobile number do not match
The status of the API request.
User's mobile number. The remitter number will be masked.
User's account number. The remitter account number will be masked.
Unique transaction ID for each transaction.
The amount charged by the bank for the transaction.
Timestamp of the Credit Amount Webhook.
The unique transaction reference id created by the beneficiary entity.

_data.text:
#### API: `/credit` # This API is used to complete the transaction by crediting the amount to the beneficiary's account. This API can only be used by the **beneficiary entity** of the respective transaction. - If the `type` in the Credit Amount Webhook is **PAYMENT** / **EX_PAYMENT** call the Confirm Credit API with the **status** `SUCCESS` / `FAILED` in **realtime**. - If the `type` in the Credit Amount Webhook is **DEPOSIT** call the Confirm Credit API with the **status** `HOLD` in **realtime**. - When the user handover money to the **entity's** cash counter, call the Confirm Credit API in **realtime** and confirm with the **status** `SUCCESS`. - If the user **fails** to deposit money to the **entity's** cash counter, a request to Confirm Credit API should be sent with the **status** `FAILED` after closing the daybook. ## Request ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ----------------- | --- | --------- | --- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **API_ID** | | `String` | | Unique ID generated from **dashboard** to validate API request.
_Eg:_ 1a21as51a351f1155f | | **API_KEY** | | `String` | | Unique KEY generated from the **dashboard** to validate API request.
_Eg:_ AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S | | **code** | | `String` | | Status code for the transaction request. [Find response codes](#response-codes) | | **status** | | `String` | | Transaction status against Credit Amount Webhook request.
Allowed values
  • `SUCCESS`
  • `FAILED`
  • `HOLD`
| | **txn_id** | | `String` | | Unique Transaction ID received in the Credit Amount Webhook.
_Eg:_ 1606481855474083 | | **txn_type** | | `String` | | Allowed values
  • `PAYMENT`
  • `REFUND`
  • `DEPOSIT`
  • `EX_PAYMENT`
| | **txn_amount** | | `String` | | Transaction amount creditted to the beneficiary account.
_Eg:_ 1200.99 | | **txn_reference** | | `String` | | A unique transaction reference id created by the beneficiary entity.
Character length : **40 (Max)**
_Eg:_ maj273y619byt14 | |**account_balance** | | `String` | | The latest balance after crediting the **txn_amount**. | - Send request as `SUCCESS` if the `txn_amount` is credited to the beneficiary's account. Else **status** must be`FAILED`. - Use `HOLD` only if the `type` in the Credit Amount Webhook is **DEPOSIT**. ### Result Code #### Success Result - `1001` - SUCCESS / HOLD #### Failed Result - `9998` - Account not found - `9997` - Account is inactive / blocked / closed - `9995` - Credit is not allowed - `9994` - Account number and mobile number do not match - `9993` - User declined - `9992` - Time expired ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmCredit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401", "auth": { "API_ID": "1a21as51a351f1155f", "API_KEY": "AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S" } }, "content": "1dfcd151e469769fed51d2f352bae7e519b916af95b805f64541212dea10ab04a46065f3012633fd8333270dd130a74765d5b55509fadcdc53f2f5e87080aeb3e5512b752e392eefcdacea0f07ea2357.b616e26deb6ad163" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmCredit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401", "auth": { "API_ID": "1a21as51a351f1155f", "API_KEY": "AAD5451FS654SD6F5SD46F3S1D5S" } }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "txn_id": "1606481855474083", "txn_type": "DEPOSIT", "txn_amount": "1200", "txn_reference": "maj273y619byt14", "account_balance":"45200.30" } } } ``` ## Response ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------- | --- | --------- | --- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **code** | | `String` | | Status code for API request. | | **status** | | `String` | | The status of the API request. | | **mobile** | | `String` | | User's mobile number. The remitter number will be masked. | | **name** | | `String` | | Name of the user. | | **account_number** | | `String` | | User's account number. The remitter account number will be masked. | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code of the entity. | | **entity_name** | | `String` | | Name of entity. | | **entity_code** | | `String` | | Unique code for the entity. | | **txn_id** | | `String` | | Unique transaction ID for each transaction. | | **txn_type** | | `String` | | The type of transaction. | | **txn_amount** | | `String` | | The transaction amount. | | **txn_bank_charge** | | `String` | | The amount charged by the bank for the transaction. | | **txn_total_amount**| | `String` | | Total transaction amount including **txn_bank_charge**. | | **txn_date** | | `String` | | Date of transaction. Format (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-03 | | **txn_note** | | `String` | | User-added note for reference. | | **txn_credit_ts** | | `String` | | Timestamp of the Credit Amount Webhook. | | **txn_reference** | | `String` | | The unique transaction reference id created by the beneficiary entity. | ### Response Code #### Success Response - `1001` - SUCCESS #### Failed Response - `9989` - **txn_reference** is not unique - `9988` - Transaction details do not match ### Response format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmCredit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": ".f8b8b03183538cc4" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "confirmCredit", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606482401" }, "content": { "result": { "code": "1001", "status": "SUCCESS", "message": "Success" }, "data": { "remitter": { "mobile": "91******1313", "name": "BINU", "account_number": "*******7322", "branch_code": "BR001", "entity_name": "ICICI", "entity_code": "in.icici" }, "beneficiary": { "mobile": "911111111111", "name": "RAJESH", "account_number": "3988762547321", "branch_code": "BR001", "entity_name": "ICICI", "entity_code": "in.icici" }, "transaction": { "txn_id": "1606481855474083", "txn_type": "DEPOSIT", "txn_amount": "100", "txn_bank_charge": "1", "txn_total_amount": "101", "txn_date": "2020-11-27", "txn_note": "the type of transaction deposit", "txn_credit_ts": "1606481879", "txn_reference": "123456789ghhg08nxv" } } } } ```

_data.title: Debit Amount

children.value: This Webhook is used to debit amount from the requested users account of the remitter entity.
will be triggered on the transaction date.
This webhook will be triggered every
until a request is received in the
to our platform to receive requests from us.
User account number to be debited.
A unique transaction ID for transaction identification.
is used to transfer money to another user.
is used to debit the amount of the wrong / disputed credit transaction. And this will be a new transaction.
, the details of the previous credit transaction will be given in the
from the account at the counter.
is used to make a bank transfer via NEFT / UPI.

_data.text:
This Webhook is used to debit amount from the requested users account of the remitter entity. This `Webhook` will be triggered on the transaction date. This `Webhook` does **not require a response** as a supplementary request to [Confirm Debit API](/confirm_debit) is **mandatory**. This webhook will be triggered every **15 seconds** until a request is received in the Confirm Debit API against the `txn_id` received with this `Webhook`. ## Request You need to add a `Webhook URI` to our platform to receive requests from us. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | -------- | --- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | | Remitter user's mobile number.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 919876543210 | | **account_number** | | `String` | | User account number to be debited. | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code holding account number. | | **txn_id** | | `String` | | A unique transaction ID for transaction identification.
_Eg:_ 1606481855474083 | | **type** | | `String` | | Allowed values
  • `PAYMENT`
  • `REFUND`
  • `WITHDRAWAL`
  • `EX_PAYMENT`
| | **amount** | | `String` | | Transaction amount.
_Eg:_ 1200.99 | | **date** | | `String` | | The date of transaction. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-03 | - **PAYMENT** `type` is used to transfer money to another user. - **REFUND** `type` is used to debit the amount of the wrong / disputed credit transaction. And this will be a new transaction. > If the `type` is **REFUND**, the details of the previous credit transaction will be given in the `refund_reference`. - **WITHDRAWAL** `type` is used to collect **cash** from the account at the counter. - **EX_PAYMENT** `type` is used to make a bank transfer via NEFT / UPI. ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "debitAmount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955" }, "content": "bbd92b84b952ed0e563acae7afe00262d2e50b80e240cdd318866959c1355ce1c8017ff5cff66238b84506d4cdc4b22d0acee515d57736c25538cdecbfbf0baef60812a4519a9beac7e63abf0bb8e.f47755ec7ecd2450" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "debitAmount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606481955" }, "content": { "data": { "remitter": { "mobile": "911313131313", "account_number": "3988762547322", "branch_code": "BR001" }, "transaction": { "txn_id": "1606481855474083", "type": "REFUND", "amount": "3600", "date": "2020-12-17" }, "refund_reference": { // Previous credit transaction information "txn_id": "1608542300461292", "amount": "4000", "date": "2020-12-14" } } } } ```

_data.title: Credit Amount

children.value: This Webhook is used to credit the amount in real time to the Beneficiary Account.
will be triggered on the transaction date.
This webhook will be triggered every
until a request is received in the
to our platform to receive requests from us.
User account number to be debited.
A unique transaction ID for transaction identification.
is used to confirm receipt of money from another user.
is used to credit back the amount of a failed payment made to another user. And this will be a new transaction.
, the details of the debit transaction will be given in the
to the account at the counter.
is used to confirm receipt of money by bank transfer via NEFT / UPI.

_data.text:
This Webhook is used to credit the amount in real time to the Beneficiary Account. This `Webhook` will be triggered on the transaction date. This `Webhook` does **not require a response** as a supplementary request to [Confirm Credit API](/confirm_credit) is **mandatory**. This webhook will be triggered every **15 seconds** until a request is received in the Confirm Credit API against the `txn_id` received with this `Webhook`. ## Request You need to add a `Webhook URI` to our platform to receive requests from us. ### Parameters | Parameter | | Type | | Description | | ------------------ | --- | -------- | --- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **mobile** | | `String` | | Beneficiary user's mobile number.
Character length : **12**
_Eg:_ 911234567890 | | **account_number** | | `String` | | User account number to be debited. | | **branch_code** | | `String` | | Branch code holding account number. | | **txn_id** | | `String` | | A unique transaction ID for transaction identification.
_Eg:_ 1606481855474083 | | **type** | | `String` | | Allowed values
  • `PAYMENT`
  • `REFUND`
  • `DEPOSIT`
  • `EX_PAYMENT`
| | **amount** | | `String` | | Transaction amount.
_Eg:_ 1200.99 | | **date** | | `String` | | The date of transaction. (YYYY-MM-DD)
_Eg:_ 2020-11-03 | - **PAYMENT** `type` is used to confirm receipt of money from another user. - **REFUND** `type` is used to credit back the amount of a failed payment made to another user. And this will be a new transaction. > If the `type` is **REFUND**, the details of the debit transaction will be given in the `refund_reference`. - **DEPOSIT** `type` is used to credit **cash** to the account at the counter. - **EX_PAYMENT** `type` is used to confirm receipt of money by bank transfer via NEFT / UPI. ### Request format ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "creditAmount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606491955" }, "content": "e78e480c202293848e939d034964be794af87821036115e7c3f8d71d157891be0fb7b2f63106144ba90765d19d23a21062e7cf9ee2f71a985408fb8f0496a0239b605727a19a74a932e4ed838046ab8ae4cce10c739dbe3906cf3a250cdfabf3b344f543dbdc0ac274396ac06.eb666d50a806aa83" } ``` ```json[json] { "head": { "api": "creditAmount", "apiVersion": "V1", "timeStamp": "1606491955" }, "content": { "data": { "beneficiary": { "mobile": "911111111111", "account_number": "3988762547321", "branch_code": "BR001" }, "transaction": { "txn_id": "1608465855474083", "type": "REFUND", "amount": "4100", "date": "2020-12-18" }, "refund_reference": { // Previous debit transaction information "txn_id": "1606491300412926", "amount": "4500", "date": "2020-12-14" } } } } ```

_data.title: Response Codes

children.value: If the request is processed successfully, the response must be
that apply to all APIs and Webhook.
in an API are listed on the corresponding

_data.text:
### Success Response

<alert type="success">

If the request is processed successfully, the response must be `SUCCESS`.

</alert>

- `1001` - SUCCESS

### Error Response

These are common `error codes` that apply to all APIs and Webhook.

<alert type="warning">

The `error codes` that apply to a **request** and **response** in an API are listed on the corresponding **API documentation page**.

</alert>

- `2001` - Failed due to technical error
- `2002` - Error with service provider
- `2003` - Service not available
- `2004` - Authentication failed
- `2005` - Server Down
- `2006` - Cannot process this request
- `2007` - Encryption failed
- `2008` - Decryption failed

_data.title: Delevoper Docs
_data.subtitle: Developer documents to help the entity integrate with Rimit.

children.value: If you are on a Multi-Tenant platform, it is

_data.text:
Switch to dark mode: 

Switch to light mode: 

## APIs We use `POST` method for all APIs. ### Multi-Tenant If you are on a Multi-Tenant platform, it is **recommended** to use the unique tenant id or unique entity id in the `params` or `query`. Applying any method **other than recommended** may affect future upgrades. ### Webhook You need to add `Webhook URIs` to our dashboard to receive requests from us. We use **encryption** for each request to protect the data. ### REST To validate the request, `API_ID` and `API_KEY` must be passed through the `head` object in the request body. These can be generated from the **dashboard**. Base URL for the **test server** - `https://uat.rimit.co` ## Security We use `AES-256-CBC` for encryption for safeguarding the data over HTTPS. A unique `key` is required to **encrypt** and **decrypt** data for request and response. entitys can generate `key` from the dashboard. `IV (Initialization Vector)` is a unique random string of 16 characters. Both `IV` and `key` are used for **encryption** and **decryption**. ### Encryption We create **ciphertext** using `IV` and `key`. `IV` is mentioned at the end of the `content` object. > `ciphertext` and `IV` are separated by a `fullstop`. entitys must encrypt `content` object using the `key` and newly generated`IV`. ### Decryption entitys can decrypt `content` object using a `key` already received and an `IV` which is sent along with `ciphertext`. The `IV` should pass at the end of the response `content` object. `IV` is required to decrypt the `ciphertext`. > `ciphertext` and `IV` should be separated by a `fullstop`.
